name: The Necropolis DEMO Version
description:
Behind your mirror, there is a reflection of our reality. This reflection
is a dimension, where everything is possible. But what happens when the true world reaches its demise? When hate has taken over? Then this dimension becomes an ultimate nightmare and The Necropolis is born. Can you stop this? Can you save the world from its demise? And most importantly... Are you who you want to be or does your mirror show something else? Everyone has a Necropolis inside them. Their true bad selves shown in the mirror. Do you?

Controls:
Arrows- Move
Space or Z button - Check and Choose
Esc. - Open Menu
Shift - Run

Control Estin/ Eric on his adventure to save the world from its demise and stop the phenomenon of the Necropolis. As an RPG game the game has battles and exploration. In most battles you will either have the choice to kill the enemy after the battle or show mercy and become friends. It is your choice whether you will stop or make the Necropolis more powerful.

Also note that this is the DEMO version of the game. The Full game is estimated to come out in 2019.
